arts.ttl: Man United's Antony addresses Ruben Amorim relationship after controversial "physicality" comment
arts.sum: Manchester United attacker Antony, who is on loan at Real Betis, insists that he has "a good relationship" with Red Devils head coach Ruben Amorim.

arts.ttl: Olivier Giroud Ends 8-Month MLS Goal Drought With Exquisite Free Kick for LAFC
arts.sum: The French World Cup champion had failed to score in his first 16 MLS matches ahead of Saturday night

arts.ttl: Bouanga converts late penalty to pull LAFC into 3-3 draw with Portland
arts.sum: Denis Bouanga converted a penalty kick in the 90th minute to pull LAFC into a 3-3 draw against the Portland Timbers on Saturday night. Portland went ahead in the ninth minute when Mora converted a penalty kick after he was fouled in the box by LAFC goalkeeper Hugo Loris.

arts.ttl: Evander Da Silva Ferreira scores twice as Cincinnati tops Fire 3-2 for fourth straight victory
arts.sum: His second goal — and sixth in his first season with the club — came in the 71st minute with an assist from Luca Orellano for a 3-1 lead. Evander Da Silva Ferreira scored a goal in each half and FC Cincinnati upped its win streak to four with a 3-2 victory over the Chicago Fire on Saturday night.

arts.ttl: Antony reveals his true feelings about Ruben Amorim as Man United flop enjoys incredible turnaround after Old Trafford exile
arts.sum: The winger, 25, has been reinvigorated since joining Real Betis from Manchester United in January, scoring four goals and logging four assists in 16 games for the La Liga side.

arts.ttl: Antony sends message to Ruben Amorim after blast from Man Utd star's agent
arts.sum: Antony is currently thriving with Spanish side Real Betis following a January loan exit from Manchester United and has sent a message to the Red Devils’ current boss after green-lighting his move

arts.ttl: LAFC to Seek New Coach With Steve Cherundolo To Depart After 2025 Season
arts.sum: LAFC have enjoyed a silverware-filled spell since Cherundolo joined the club ahead of the 2022 MLS season

arts.ttl: Antony: Personal life 'got in the way' of Utd form
arts.sum: Antony has said issues in his personal life "got in the way" of his ability to find his best form at Man United and ultimately led to his departure.
